articles.title: The Science of Crypto Forensics Survives a Court Battle—for Now

articles.title: Woman found with £2bn in Bitcoin convicted

articles.content:
A former takeaway worker found with Bitcoin worth more than £2bn has been convicted at Southwark Crown Court of a crime linked to money laundering.
